description: Stack Exchange is a network of Q&A communities where users ask questions, share knowledge, and collaborate on topics like coding, math, and more

capabilities.name: STACK_EXCHANGE_GET_COLLECTIVE_QUESTIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve questions associated with the specified collective. Use when you have a collective ID and need its questions for a site.

capabilities.name: STACK_EXCHANGE_GET_COLLECTIVES
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve all collectives on a Stack Exchange site in alphabetical order. Use when you need to list collectives for display or filtering.

capabilities.name: STACK_EXCHANGE_GET_COLLECTIVE_TAGS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve tags associated with specified collectives. Use when you need collective tags for display or analysis after confirming which collectives to query.

capabilities.name: STACK_EXCHANGE_GET_COMMENT_FLAG_OPTIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to fetch valid flag options for a given comment. Use when you need to know which flags a user can raise before submitting. Requires authenticated access.

capabilities.name: STACK_EXCHANGE_GET_COMMENTS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve comments from a specified Stack Exchange site. Use when you need to list comments with optional filters and sorting.

capabilities.name: STACK_EXCHANGE_GET_REVISIONS_BY_IDS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve revisions for specific posts by their IDs. Use when you need to examine the edit history of posts by providing semicolon-delimited IDs.

capabilities.name: STACK_EXCHANGE_GET_SEARCH_RESULTS
capabilities.description: Tool to search the site for questions meeting certain criteria. Use after defining tags or keywords to locate relevant questions. At least one of 'tagged' or 'intitle' must be set.

capabilities.name: STACK_EXCHANGE_GET_SITES
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve all Stack Exchange sites and their api_site_parameter values. Use when you need to discover available sites for API calls.
